weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am often seen during the winter.
☃️ You can make snowmen with me.
👕 You need to wear warm clothes when I'm around.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ Plants need me to grow.
🕶️ You need to wear sunglasses when I'm very bright.
🔥 I give off heat and light.

weather.question: I come from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌧️ Plants need me to drink.
💧 I am water falling from the sky.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can sometimes look like sheep.
☁️ I am made of water droplets or ice crystals.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I blow hard and can make trees sway. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can rustle leaves.
🪁 You can fly a kite when I'm blowing.
💨 I am moving air.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc that appears after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have seven colors.
✨ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.
🍀 Some people believe there is gold at my end.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky, followed by a loud boom. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am dangerous, so stay inside during a storm.
⛈️ I often come with thunder.
💡 I am a natural electrical discharge.

weather.question: I am a loud rumbling sound that follows a flash of light in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I can be very scary.
🌩️ I travel slower than lightning.
👂 You hear me during a storm.

weather.question: I am frozen rain. I am small balls of ice that fall from the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you.
⚽ Sometimes I can be the size of marbles.
🥶 I'm like frozen raindrops.

weather.question: I am a very strong storm with a spinning center and powerful winds over the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the middle.
🌊 I can cause a lot of damage to coastal areas.
🌪️ I am also known as a cyclone or typhoon in some places.

bug.question: I'm a tiny bug that makes honey so sweet, I fly around flowers and buzz. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I like yellow flowers.
🐝 I make a buzzing sound.
🍯 You can eat what I make on toast.

bug.question: I hop around, I'm green and long, I make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to hide in tall grass.
🐸 I am not a frog but I can leap.
🎶 You hear me chirping in the summer.

bug.question: I have bright spots and crawl around low, I am considered good luck, you know. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 My spots can be red, yellow, or orange.
🍀 People say I bring good luck.
🌱 I like to eat aphids off of plants.

bug.question: I march in lines, a colony so grand, I carry food all over the land. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 We work together in a big group.
🐜 I am very small, but very strong.
🍪 I love to steal your picnic food.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, munching leaves all day, then wrap myself up to magically transform. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have pretty wings when I grow up.
🐛 I like to eat a lot when I am young.
✨ I go through a big change called metamorphosis.

bug.question: I light up the night with a blinking bright gleam, a summer night spectacle, a luminous dream. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I shine best when it is dark outside.
💚 I can be found in fields and gardens.
💡 I use light to attract a mate.

bug.question: I live in the water when I'm young and fly when I grow, I buzz around and bite your arm, you know. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I need water to hatch my eggs.
🦟 I have a long, thin nose.
🚫 People don't like me because I bite.

bug.question: I build my home with silk, so fine, a cozy little web, uniquely mine. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I like to live in trees or bushes.
🕷️ People are sometimes scared of me, but most are harmless.
🕸️ I catch my dinner in a sticky trap.

bug.question: I can be found in old books or furniture, chewing away and causing damage for sure. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I like to eat wood.
🐛 I am small and pale.
🪑 I can damage wooden furniture.

bug.question: I mimic a leaf to hide from view, a master of disguise, cleverly true. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I look just like part of a tree.
🌿 I am green or brown, and very still.
🌳 Predators find it hard to spot me.
